description: Compatibility with WarpGrid-extended ComponentizeJS runtime (database proxy, DNS, filesystem, process.env shims active)
shimsActive: warpgrid:shim/database-proxy — Postgres wire protocol passthrough via WIT
warpgrid:shim/dns — Service registry + /etc/hosts + system DNS resolution

packages.name: pg
packages.notes: IMPROVED: Works via warpgrid/pg database proxy shim wrapping warpgrid:shim/database-proxy WIT interface

packages.name: ioredis
packages.blockingIssue: Requires full net.Socket duplex stream API with events, reconnection, and pipeline support
packages.workaround: Use WarpGrid Redis proxy directly via warpgrid.database.connect() with RESP protocol bytes
packages.notes: Database proxy shim handles byte passthrough but ioredis needs full net.Socket EventEmitter interface

packages.name: express
packages.blockingIssue: Requires http.createServer() listener architecture incompatible with WASI request/response model
packages.workaround: Use hono (request/response handler model compatible with WASI and WarpGrid)
packages.notes: Express fundamentally requires Node.js http module server model; not shimable

packages.name: hono
packages.notes: Web-standard request/response model, no Node.js dependencies

packages.name: zod
packages.notes: Pure TypeScript schema validation, fully compatible

packages.name: jose
packages.notes: IMPROVED: PEM key file loading now works via warpgrid.fs.readFile() filesystem shim

packages.name: uuid
packages.notes: Uses crypto.getRandomValues() which is available in StarlingMonkey

packages.name: lodash-es
packages.notes: Pure JavaScript utility library, fully compatible

packages.name: date-fns
packages.notes: Pure JavaScript date utilities, no Node.js dependencies

packages.name: nanoid
packages.notes: Uses crypto.getRandomValues() which is available in StarlingMonkey

packages.name: superjson
packages.notes: Pure JavaScript serialization library, fully compatible

packages.name: drizzle-orm
packages.notes: IMPROVED: Query execution now works via warpgrid/pg database proxy shim as the driver

packages.name: kysely
packages.notes: IMPROVED: Query execution now works via warpgrid/pg database proxy shim as the dialect driver

packages.name: better-sqlite3
packages.blockingIssue: Native C++ addon requiring Node.js N-API; cannot compile to Wasm
packages.workaround: Use sql.js (Emscripten SQLite) or WarpGrid database proxy with Postgres
packages.notes: Fundamentally incompatible — native binary addon, not shimable

packages.name: node-fetch
packages.blockingIssue: Requires Node.js http/https modules for outbound HTTP; not shimmed by WarpGrid
packages.workaround: Use native fetch() API (available in StarlingMonkey)
packages.notes: Native fetch() is the recommended approach; node-fetch is redundant in WASI

packages.name: axios
packages.blockingIssue: Requires XMLHttpRequest or Node.js http adapter; neither available
packages.workaround: Use native fetch() API (available in StarlingMonkey)
packages.notes: Native fetch() is the recommended approach; axios adapter selection fails

packages.name: dotenv
packages.notes: IMPROVED: .env file reading now works via warpgrid.fs.readFile() filesystem shim

packages.name: pino
packages.blockingIssue: Transport/destination features require Node.js stream infrastructure
packages.workaround: Use basic pino() logging; advanced transports not available
packages.notes: IMPROVED: Basic logging and level configuration work via process.env polyfill; transports still limited

packages.name: fast-json-stringify
packages.notes: Pure JavaScript JSON serialization, fully compatible

packages.name: ajv
packages.notes: Pure JavaScript schema validation, fully compatible
